text: KLHV may refer to: * KLHV (FM), an K-Love affiliate (88.5 FM) licensed to serve Cotton Valley, Louisiana * KVXO, a radio station (88.3 FM) licensed to Fort Collins, Colorado, which held the call sign KLHV from 2003 to 2008 and 2008 to 2009 * William T. Piper Memorial Airport in Clinton County, Pennsylvania, United States, which is assigned ICAO code KLHV
title: KLHV
